about.title: About
about.description: A passionate backend developer with an innate love for programming and boundless creativity. My innovative approach and solid technical skills drive me to tackle challenges with enthusiasm. Ready to contribute my passion and expertise to challenging projects.

list.title: Link Shorter
list.description: This is a full backend link shorter app with server side render and tailwind css, include sqlite database to save the links.

list.title: Badge API
list.description: This is a badge api for make svg with custom text, color and border to POST it into your projects docs and make it look better.
